product_name: Nite Ize Gear Tie 12'' - Package of 2
long_description: The 12 in. Nite Ize Gear Tie is made of a sturdy, colorful rubber exterior with an strong bendable wire interior. It wraps, ties and organizes cords, devices and tools with a simple twist. Keep your jumper cables, extension cords, dog leashes and electric cords neat and untangled. Nite Ize Gear Tie is also great for looping and hanging lightweight tools and lanterns. Tough and nonmarking rubber shell is grippy, waterproof and UV-resistant.
short_description: The 12 in. Nite Ize Gear Tie is made of a sturdy, colorful rubber exterior with an strong bendable wire interior. It wraps, ties and organizes cords, devices and tools with a simple twist.
